pages.text: 38|62|udumeolideul-eun uliga healigon haessdeon saaghan jadeul-eul bol su eobs neun geos-eun eotteon il-inyo
38|63|uliga geudeul-eul jolonghaessgi ttae mun-inyo animyeon uliui nun-i geudeul eul boji musham-inyo
38|64|sillo geudeul-i buljiog-eseo seo lo nonjaenghandaneun jinlineun sasil-ila
38|65|illeogalodoe sillo naneun gyeong-go ja-e bulgwahamyeo hollo gyesimyeo modeun geos-eul jugwanhasineun hananim oeeneun sin-i eobsnola
38|66|hananim-eun haneulgwa daejiwa geu sai manmul-ui junim-isimyeo gwonneung-gwa gwan-yong-eulo chungmanhasin bun-isila
38|67|illeogalodoe igeos-eun gajang jung yohan gyesila
38|68|geuleonde neohuineun deung-eul dollindan mal-inyo
38|69|geudeuldo uigyeon-eul dallihaneun geos-eul naega eotteohge al-assneunyo
38|70|igeos-eun naega bunmyeonghan gyeong-goja e bulgwahadaneun gyesila
38|71|junimkkeseo cheonsadeul-ege malsseum-iiss-eossnola naega heulg-eulo ingan-eul bich eul geos-ila
38|72|naega ingan-ui hyeongsang-eul mandeul-eo geu an-e nae yeonghon-eul bulleo neoh-eulinigeuleul gyeongbaehala
38|73|modeun cheonsadeul-i dahamkke geuleoh ge hayeoss-euna
38|74|ibeulliseuneun geuleohji anihagogeomanhayeo bulsinja jung-e issge doeeoss deola

38|75|hananimkkeseo malsseumhasa ibeulliseuya mueos-i neolo hayeogeum naega naui duson-eulo changjohan geuege bubog ham-eul banghaehaneunyo neoui omanham-ingaanimyeon nega gajang wie issneun ja gaunde issneunyo
38|76|ibeulliseuga daedabhagil jega geuboda hullyungham-iyo dangsinkkeseo jeoleulmandeusim-e bul-eseo changjohayeossgo geuleulmandeung-e heulg-eseo bich-eossseubnida
38|77|hananim-i malsseumhasa igos-eseo nagala sillo neoneun jeojubad-eun jala
38|78|simpan-ui geunalkkaji naui jeoju ga neoege iss-eulila
38|79|ibeulliseuga malhagil juyeo jug eunjaga buhwaldoeneun geunalkkaji jeoleul yuyehayeo jusoseo
38|80|hananimkkeseo malsseumhasa geuleomyeon nega yuyedoenani
38|81|gyeoljeongdoen geu sigan-ui nalkkajila
38|82|ibeulliseuga malhagil dangsin-ui gwonneung-e maengsehageonde naega geudeul mo duleul yuhoghalila
38|83|geuleona dangsin-ui eunhyelo malmi am-a seongsilhan dangsin-ui jongdeul-eun je-oe la hani
